sentences.sContent: The budget buffet attracted customers with immoderate appetites but limited pocket books.
sentences.sContent_eng: The budget buffet attracted customers with immoderate appetites but limited pocket books.
sentences.sCn: 廉价的自助餐吸引了胃口大但囊中羞涩的顾客们。

sentences.sContent: This individualism in the society provides fertile breeding ground for torrent of immoderate emotions to mushroom.
sentences.sContent_eng: This individualism in the society provides fertile breeding ground for torrent of immoderate emotions to mushroom.
sentences.sCn: 这种社会中的个人主义为过激的情绪提供了生长的温床。

synos.tran: 无节制的，过度的；不适中的
